Player History
Drafted in 34th round, 529th overall pick, by Detroit in 2015...
Injured on 9/2/2015 with a Strained Tricep Muscle, out for 2 weeks...

8/24/2021: Signed a contract extension with Detroit, $15,000,000 per year, for 5 years.
Injured on 9/17/2021 with a Strained Back, out for 2 weeks...
Injured on 4/19/2023 with a Inflamed Bicep Tendon, out for 4 weeks...

rez)...

Traded from Cincinnati to Colorado on 2/16/2025 (Going to COL: P Cleo Maldonado, P Andreas Speers. Going to CIN: SS Bradly Doty)...
Injured on 6/26/2025 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/2025, going 5-0, 2.68...
Injured on 7/6/2025 with a Sore Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
